levelChange

public void levelChange(BoardBuilder<T> boardBuilder)
when an epoch ends, and prepares for the next level, some cleanup on the board must be done before moving on. which includes returning all the castles on the board to the respective player(s).

Parameters:
coordinate -
boardBuilder -
